Posts.Content: Sep 14, 2009 10:10PM shannie604 wrote: This might not be the right place to post this question but what about a third lumpectomy vs. masectomy?  I was DX with DCIS about three weeks ago and have had two lumpectomies since.  Apparently we are chasing this stuff trying to outrun the margins.  The last one came back just under 1mm.  So, now my choice is another lumpectomy (and hope to capture all the margins) plus radiation or a masectomy with reconstruction.  I know I will opt for immediate reconstruction, I am just too vain to go without a boob.  What would you do?
Posts.Title: What made you decide . . . Mantra Mantra
